name: function-web-components
description: A library to write Web Components as a single function
author: Jan Kuehle <jkuehle90@gmail.com>

scripts.build: yarn mkdirp dist && terser src/index.js -o dist/index.js
scripts.release: yarn build && cross-var "git commit -am v$npm_package_version" && cross-var "git tag v$npm_package_version" && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
